cat.desc: show the shell script for setting up this env

clean.desc: remote env entry and installed package

envsecute.desc: execute a shell command in the context of a given environment-setting prewrapper

refresh.desc: refresh environment setup (re-setup related software version)

resolve.desc: resolve all dependencies for a given software

rmtmp.desc: remove tmp entries (when installation to env entry failed)

set.desc: prepare and set environment for a given software

xset.desc: set env for command line (pre-set various flags)

desc: software environments (to abstract multiple tools and their versions)
